services.name: Fed Foundation Audit
services.tagline: Validate your federal profile after research—before you scale.
services.description: Many firms register on SAM.gov, build a capability statement, and set up their SBA profile without the benefit of market research. The result? Profiles optimized for nothing, codes that don't align with actual federal spend, and narratives that miss the mark. The Fed Foundation Audit is our systematic review of your existing federal foundation—but only after you've completed the appropriate market research to inform what 'good' actually looks like. We audit your SAM.gov registration (compliance based on FAR requirements, code selection, completeness), your SBA/DSBS profile (narrative quality, keyword optimization, past performance presentation), and your capability statement (design, layout, content, format). We also verify that your contact information reflects a professional business domain (name@businessdomain.com) rather than generic email services. You walk away with a prioritized remediation plan and the confidence that your foundation is research-driven, not guesswork.
